intro.title: 1. Service Introduction
intro.content: Toolypet is a free online tool collection service operated by an individual. All tools can be used for free without registration.

items.0: All services are provided free of charge

items.1: Placing excessive load on services through automated means

items.0: This service is operated by a solo developer and assumes no responsibility for service interruptions or errors
items.1: No liability for any loss or damage resulting from tool usage
items.2: Services may be changed or discontinued without notice

ads.title: 5. Advertising
ads.content: Google AdSense advertisements may be displayed to support service operations. Ad content is provided by Google, and the operator is not responsible for ad content.

intro.title: 1. Personal Information Collection
intro.content: Toolypet is a service without registration and does not directly collect user personal information.

analytics.title: 2. Analytics Tools
analytics.content: The following tools may be used for service improvement:

items.1: Google AdSense: Ad display and related cookie usage

analytics.note: These services process data according to their own privacy policies.

cookies.title: 3. Cookie Usage
cookies.content: The service uses cookies for the following purposes:

items.0: Saving user preferences (e.g., dark mode, language settings)

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: Most tools run in the browser and do not transmit user data to servers. However, some features (e.g., security vulnerability scanning, external API calls) require server-side processing due to technical constraints. Even in these cases, input data is deleted immediately after processing and is not stored in any form.

rights.title: 5. User Rights
rights.content: You can refuse or delete cookies. However, some features may be limited.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Updates
upcoming.disclaimer: * Future plans are subject to change based on development progress.
